thread.section_title: Kiwi Drug Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Kiwi Drug | kiwidrug.com
thread.title: Wayne Stout
thread.title_full: Kiwi Drug reviewed by Wayne Stout

author: Wayne Stout
title: Wayne Stout
text:
I had an advantage of having been raised in New Zealand and made many trips back, so I didn't have the worry of dealing with a unknown Country.
Now I live in the US, I get way overcharged for medicine. So it is a simple matter of saving Money. I have insurance so when my $151 co-pay was mentioned, I went on line. and got what I needed for $31. I didn't see the need for 300gm , I just got 120gm so it's 49.68% of my local cost after the $7.xx Shipping.
I did worry about the Shipping time however as the said it could take a month to get it. I got in in about a week, so I'm one happy customer.
Oh, and the packet arrived, in perfect condition.
